overview_of_class: Portuguese 115-2 is the sequence of Portuguese 115-1. The course deepens concepts and usage of Portuguese in comparison and contrast to Spanish - or other Romance Languages. Emphasis on socio-linguistic and an interactive approach to develop an intercultural communicative competence that targets pronunciation, intonation, and sentence structure in patterns of spoken and written Portuguese. The course also highlights sociological and historical aspects of Portuguese speaking countries other than Brazil.
name: Portuguese for Spanish Speakers
subject: PORT
